tags: found this in my drafts and i stand by it
summary: Mighty Nein Age Headcanons
title: Mighty Nein Age Headcanons
body:
(With some basis in canon but mostly just in my own head)

Caleb - 33: This is both canon and makes perfect sense. He’s the oldest of the group and absolutely does not want that title. Fluctuates wildly between “there is no way in hell I am older than these people I have no idea what I’m doing” and “these children are going to get me killed”.

Fjord - 30: Juuust hit the big three-zero and is mildly horrified about it. Constantly posturing as ‘An Adult™’ because he feels like he should be one by now but really has no idea what he’s doing. Hangs out with Caleb as the “grownups” as if he doesn’t still go along with whatever stupid shit the others come up with at the drop of a hat.

Molly & Yasha - 28/29: Just teetering at the tail end of their twenties and dealing with it in wildly different ways. Molly’s still trying to cram in every possible reckless life experience he can, and Yasha both acts and feels like she has transcended the mortal concept of age. They’re both still young and dumb at heart though.

Beau & Jester - 24/26: They both definitely fall somewhere in the range of “just got out of college and have to be fully responsible for myself for the first time and oh god it sucks help”. Still at the age where they feel immortal and completely divorced from any and all consequences. 100% enable each other’s stupid ideas as to what reasonable adult behavior is.

Nott - 16/18: Angry teenager who had to grow up way too fast and is ready to fight the whole world because of it. Desperate to be taken seriously. Has so much room in her young heart and feels things so, so strongly. Consequences don’t exist because the future is a vague concept that might not even be real.

summary: As a Mollymauk cosplayer I'm feeling really down about this whole thing. I love Molly and worked really hard on my cosplay. I...
body: As a Mollymauk cosplayer I’m feeling really down about this whole thing. I love Molly and worked really hard on my cosplay. I still plan on wearing it of course but it’s hard to continue on when I know that there’s not going to be anymore Molly content or character development (bar something drastic happening). I know that at future CR meetups there’s going to be a whole lot of fandom that I, as Mollymauk, won’t be able to participate in and that makes me sad.

reblog.comment: As a Mollymauk cosplayer I’m feeling really down about this whole thing. I love Molly and worked really hard on my cosplay. I still plan on wearing it of course but it’s hard to continue on when I know that there’s not going to be anymore Molly content or character development (bar something drastic happening). I know that at future CR meetups there’s going to be a whole lot of fandom that I, as Mollymauk, won’t be able to participate in and that makes me sad.

tags: that ppl took molly’s words about lucian being a different person too literally
summary: I'm beginning to think that I'm the only one on tumblr who doesn't think that Lucian and Molly are two different entities. I...
body:
I’m beginning to think that I’m the only one on tumblr who doesn’t think that Lucian and Molly are two different entities. I think they’re the same, but Molly just lacks the memories. He had to rebuild a personality from scratch. That’s it.

The reason why Taliesin doesn’t know if Molly will be easily rezzed is bc he doesn’t have all the details any more than we do.

tags: this feels like when you miss the last step on a staircase
did i misjudge fandom so much?
maybe i just haven't gotten to it yet
there's is a pretty nice amount of fic
summary: I thought I had a pretty good handle on fandom themes after 2 decades, but omfg where is the CR au fic for their time in actual...
body:
I thought I had a pretty good handle on fandom themes after 2 decades, but omfg where is the CR au fic for their time in actual hell?  

Keyleth was one missed death save from literally trapping them there forever.

Percy was wrapped in chains when they bamfed out, what if that meant he got left behind?

What if Tova was a double agent for… Orthax/Deal-guy/Hotis and sabotaged them leaving at the last minute by breaking the chain of people.

Like I’ve been reading fic (cause i was spoiled for all the big shit long ago) and I didn’t even know this was a thing that was going to happen.  Usually the whump potential for something like this draws h/c ficcers from all over.

summary: I am such a goddamn FOOL. I just realized that if Beau moved her hair aside to show off her hickies that means SHE NEVER PULLED...
body: I am such a goddamn FOOL. I just realized that if Beau moved her hair aside to show off her hickies that means SHE NEVER PULLED IT BACK UP BEFORE SHOWING UP TO BREAKFAST. beau straight up went to breakfast with full on “I’ve just been fucked” bed head and then pulled her hair out of the way to fucking CONFIRM just how much she had indeed just been fucked. I’m dead.

summary: A Tribute to Mollymauk Tealeaf, Long May He Reign
title: A Tribute to Mollymauk Tealeaf, Long May He Reign
body:
And shine bright, circus man.

Back in campaign 1, we compiled lists for each character in tribute for their apparent final appearances, our personal favorite moments that we presented at the end of each of their journeys. As Mollymauk Tealeaf approaches the probable end of his, we present our favorite moments, the first tribute for a member of the Mighty Nein.

Thanks to eponymous-rose for editing (and troubleshooting!) the video, to Geek & Sundry and Critical Role for use of these clips, and to our fantastic respective community artists for the pieces below! All content used with permission. Full list with in-show timestamps below the break.

Read More

tags: i normally play rangers or rogues
summary: Anyone got space in their D&D games for a player? I've got a lot of free time for the next couple of weeks and I've been trying...
body:
Anyone got space in their D&D games for a player? I’ve got a lot of free time for the next couple of weeks and I’ve been trying to play in a game instead of running a game for a while now.

I’ve got a decent amount of experience and all my own books, and I’m very flexible in the characters I can play. I’m pretty casual in how I run things normally, but I’m adaptable.

summary:
Jester: Alright, so you and I are married.
Beau: We are not married.
Jester: Relax, it's just pretend.
Beau: I don't wanna...
body:
Jester: Alright, so you and I are married.
Beau: We are not married.
Jester: Relax, it's just pretend.
Beau: I don't wanna pretend.
Jester: Scared you'll like it?
Beau: Okay, if we're married, I want a divorce.
Caleb: Are you two like this all the time?
 Jester and Beau: [in unison] Yes.

dialogue.name: Jester
dialogue.label: Jester:
dialogue.phrase: Alright, so you and I are married.

dialogue.name: Beau
dialogue.label: Beau:
dialogue.phrase: Okay, if we're married, I want a divorce.

dialogue.name: Caleb
dialogue.label: Caleb:
dialogue.phrase: Are you two like this all the time?

blog.name: suzie-guru
blog.title: You exist as the stars exist...
blog.description: Professional bookworm, frustrated writer, artist, and actress, but mostly obsessive fangirl and nerd extraordinaire. Expect Feminism, Fairy Tales and Feels.

summary: Suzie I highly recommend Critical Role if you’re interested. Firstly, if you’ve ever considered cosplay, you would be an amazing...
question: Suzie I highly recommend Critical Role if you’re interested. Firstly, if you’ve ever considered cosplay, you would be an amazing Keyleth, their slightly awkward but insanely powerful half-elf druid. And you’ll probably fall madly in love with Percy and Vax, the tragic gunslinger and angsty emo rogue. The shenanigans and feels that come out of the misfits of Vox Machina are just delightful.
answer:
Oh man, I LOVE Critical Role already and I endlessly adore Percy/Vex so so so much - the only thing is, I just haven’t sat down and marathoned it! I’ve watched bits and pieces, but never the whole episodes. I need to carve out a decent chunk of time to do so, but it will happen, I promise. 

Secondly, I SUPER flattered and befuddled that you would think I would make an amazing Keyleth! I’ve only thought of cosplaying once before (Barbara Lake from Trollhunters), and I’m super hesitant to do so because of my weight/body type, but wow, I would have NEVER considered cosplaying as Keyleth! She’s, like, conically gorgeous, and I’m…not. So thank you, you’re super sweet to you think I would do her justice!
